remarks: Lemma to convert a frequently-used union condition.  TODO: see if this can be applied to other hdmap* theorems.  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmaplem1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
hdmaplem1.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
hdmaplem4.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
hdmaplem4.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
hdmaplem4.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmaplem4.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmaplem4.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hdmaplem4.e $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Z } ) =/= ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
hdmaplem4.f $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Z } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
hdmaplem4 $p |- ( ph -> -. Z e. ( ( N ` { X } ) u. ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) $.
